Html:
I am new here, and Thanks for the great API! I downloaded the released NAudio API 1.3 that was released on Oct 2009 from download tab. That has all the functionalities that I need wihtout any issues. Will I be good to go or should I get the latest one in Souce Code tab an build the dll myself?

Thanks!

hi, I would recommend getting the latest if you are starting a new application, as there have been lots of small improvements and enhancements. I am hoping to get 1.4 released very shortly.

Mark
